column4: hi I just installed ubuntu, and I was wondering, why does the default install have me listening on port 25? and why does trying to remove postfix try to also remove ubuntu-base?
it should have you listening on port 25 of the loopback address only
and ubuntu-base is a meta package that Depends: postfix - if you remove postfix, then it goes to.
I got that, but I was wondering more of the reason that ubuntu base depended on postfix, is the distribution somehow dependant on there being a mailserver active?
the plan is to remove that dependency for hoary +1
